SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.servercontroller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.servercontroller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class is responsible for handling the lobby, that includes all game dynamics, player's moves and connections.

      public int checkNicknameAvailability(String nickname)
      Checks the availability of a nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to check
      Returns:
      The return value of checkNicknameAvailability: according to the GameState and the nicknames it may be -1, 0 or 1

    • createLobby

      public boolean createLobby(int maxPlayerNumber, boolean onlyOneCommonCard)
      Creates the lobby of the game and sets the lobby parameters.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayerNumber - The maximum number of players
      onlyOneCommonCard - A boolean flat that indicates if there will be one common card or two
      Returns:
      True if the maxPlayerNumber is between 2 and 4, false otherwise

    • setupLobbyParameters

      public void setupLobbyParameters(int maxPlayerNumber, boolean onlyOneCommonCard)
      Sets lobby parameters.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayerNumber - The maximum number of players
      onlyOneCommonCard - A boolean flat that indicates if there will be one common card or two

    • checkSavedGame

      public boolean checkSavedGame(String nickname)
      Checks if an unfinished saved game exists and the given nickname of the player was in that game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      true if a saved game exists for the player, false otherwise

    • presentation

      public int presentation(String nickname) throws FirstPlayerException, CancelGameException, GameStartException, FullLobbyException, WaitForLobbyParametersException, RejoinRequestException
      Handles the presentation of a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      an integer representing the result of the presentation
      Throws:
      FirstPlayerException - if the player is the first player
      CancelGameException - if the game is canceled
      GameStartException - if the game starts
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full
      WaitForLobbyParametersException - if waiting for lobby parameters
      RejoinRequestException - if a rejoin request is made

      Sends a peer-to-peer message (TCP or RMI) from the sender to the receiver.
      Parameters:
      sender - the nickname of the sender
      receiver - the nickname of the receiver
      text - the text of the message
      localDateTime - the timestamp of the message
      Throws:
      InvalidNicknameException - if an invalid nickname is given
